top_hat.name: Top Hat
top_hat.desc: A tall, black top hat adorned with intricate brass gears and cogs, giving it a sophisticated yet mechanical look.

scalding_steam_breath.name: Scalding Steam Breath
scalding_steam_breath.desc: A powerful burst of scalding steam emitted from the mouth, capable of causing severe burns.

fire_breath.name: Fire Breath
fire_breath.desc: A fierce jet of flames expelled from the mouth, incinerating anything in its path.

brass_goggles.name: Brass Goggles
brass_goggles.desc: A pair of sturdy brass goggles with adjustable lenses, perfect for protecting the eyes from debris and enhancing vision.

monocle.name: Monocle
monocle.desc: Elegant clockwork monocle with brass frame

greater_shield_generator.name: Greater Shield Generator
greater_shield_generator.desc: the highest level of shield technology that has been achieved and is only used for ones of highest status and has the ability to reflect practically all attacks

chainsaw_arm.name: Chainsaw Arm
chainsaw_arm.desc: Featuring a gleaming brass design with whirring gears and a razor-sharp blade, perfect for cutting through any mechanical foes

blow_torch.name: Blow Torch
blow_torch.desc: emitting a flickering flame that can melt through metal

energy_shield_generator.name: Energy Shield Generator
energy_shield_generator.desc: Glowing blue orb with pipes going in and out of it, deflects enemy attacks and provides crucial protection

armoured_plating.name: Armoured Plating
armoured_plating.desc: Bulky steel plates attached all around the chest

steam_powered_jetpack.name: Steam-Powered Jetpack
steam_powered_jetpack.desc: A gleaming brass and steel contraption, the steam-powered jetpack sports twin exhaust vents that emit billowing plumes of white vapour.

wings.name: Wings
wings.desc: Razor sharp metal feathers hanging from a shiny steel frame attached to the back of the torso

tesla_coil.name: Tesla Coil
tesla_coil.desc: Three rings surrounding a thick metal rod, crackling with electricity and giving off a cold blue glow

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.desc: A large metal hammer positioned where the hand was, perfect for smashing foes

drill.name: Drill
drill.desc: A high power steam drill that can bore through metal and obstacles

claws.name: Claws
claws.desc: sharp talon like blades, allows for slashing attacks and climbing or manoeuvring in tight spaces

gatling_gun.name: Gatling Gun
gatling_gun.desc: a Small gun with a tube going around the hand and into an ammunition box

rocket_launcher.name: Rocket Launcher
rocket_launcher.desc: A large and heavy tube attached around the upper side of the arm, designed to fire explosives

steam_powered_canon.name: Steam-Powered Canon
steam_powered_canon.desc: A large tube with clear pipes filled with steam going into it

steam_driven_boosters.name: steam driven boosters
steam_driven_boosters.desc: steam-powered boosters to propel forward with incredible speed

steam_powered_legs.name: Steam powered legs
steam_powered_legs.desc: powerful legs with tubes full of steam pulsing all over it

razor_blades.name: Razor Blades
razor_blades.desc: Sharp rotating blades for cutting through obstacles.

saw_blades.name: Saw Blades
saw_blades.desc: Circular saw blades for slicing through tough materials.

retractable_claw_legs.name: Retractable Claw Legs
retractable_claw_legs.desc: Sharp mechanised claws that can enter / retract for swift slashing attacks and enhanced grip on surfaces

grappling_legs.name: Grappling legs
grappling_legs.desc: Retractable grappling hooks for swinging across gaps or pulling up to higher ground

hydraulic_pistons.name: Hydraulic Pistons
hydraulic_pistons.desc: powered by hydraulic systems that enable explosive jumps and powerful stomps, creating shock-waves that can knock back nearby foes

magnetic_grippers.name: Magnetic grippers
magnetic_grippers.desc: legs equipped with powerful magnetic pads for scaling and clinging to metal surfaces effortlessly

articulated_spider_legs.name: Articulated Spider Legs
articulated_spider_legs.desc: Multi-jointed legs resembling a spider's for exceptional balance and the ability to navigate difficult terrain with ease

integrated_shield_generators.name: Integrated Shield Generators
integrated_shield_generators.desc: deploys energy shields that protect from incoming attack and allowing for quick movement, providing both offence and defence in combat scenarios

stealth_mode_legs.name: Stealth Mode Legs
stealth_mode_legs.desc: Designed with sound-dampening technology allowing silent motion for sneaking up on foes or avoiding detection in critical situations

silver_lining.name: Silver Lining
silver_lining.desc: Elegant silver trim for added style.

copper_tubing.name: Copper Tubing
copper_tubing.desc: Durable copper tubes for enhanced durability.

gold_plating.name: Gold Plating
gold_plating.desc: Luxurious gold coating for a premium look.
